attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
our plight is simple, jade goody is dying, she wishes to get married and spend her final time with her children and family, all we ask is for jack tweeds tag to be removed until after the jades death, so she can enjoy what she has left, at the least remove it for the wedding, please!!! please remeber jade has been an inspiration to cancer sufferers, also has help bring cervical cancer screener to the wider public, every young woman in the country is aware of jade goodys cancer.
please help her in her last few months.
please sign the petition.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
